travelBottleSet.name: Travel Bottle Set
travelBottleSet.description: TSA-approved 4-piece travel bottle set suitable for travel toiletries and cosmetics.

universalAdapter.name: Universal Adapter
universalAdapter.description: All-in-one universal travel adapter with charging ports for USA, EU, UK, and AUS.

steamerHook.name: Steamer Hook
steamerHook.description: Light suction cup, attachable to any flat surface, that can hold a weight of up to 10 lbs.

compressionSocks.name: Compression Socks
compressionSocks.description: Men's and women's compression socks. Best graduated fit for sports and flight travel.

travelCase.name: Travel Case
travelCase.description: Black fabric travel case for convenient transportation of Besteam and its components.

luggageScale.name: Luggage Scale
luggageScale.description: Accurate home and travel luggage scale displaying weights of up to 77 lbs. (35 kg).
